attributes.action: Give the George Cross to the British divers involved in the Tham Luang rescue.
attributes.background: The George Cross is the second highest award in the UK honours system and is awarded for, "...acts of the greatest herosim or for most conspicuous courage in circumstance of extreme danger..."

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
